title: Vamoosh 6-in-1 Washing Machine Cleaner, Dissolves Hair, Eliminates Bad Odours, Removes Limescale, Deep Clean, Leaves Smelling Fresh, Antibacterial, Descales (Cotton Fresh, Pack of 2)
features: DEEP CLEANING 6-IN-1 FORMULA: 6-in-1 washing machine cleaning with HAIR DISSOLVING TECHNOLOGY. A benefit that no other washing machine cleaners offer. Vamoosh Washing Machine Cleaner prevents blockages by dissolving both human and pet hair.
KILLS 99.9% OF BACTERIA: Vamoosh Washing Machine Cleaner removes 99.9% of bacteria and micro-organisms in your washing machine and ensures your washing machine is left hygienically clean and fresh.

REMOVES LIMESCALE: Acts as a descaler to eliminate limescale that can build up on the heating element and cause it to overheat, and helps dirt and detergent residues rinse away more easily. Which helps to prolong the life of washing machines and improve the function.

ELIMINATES BAD SMELLS: Vamoosh Washing Machine Cleaner eliminates bad odours and leaves a fresh scent in your washing machine drum. As a result, Vamoosh leaves you with cleaner laundry with every wash.

Easy to Use: Use every 1-2 months. Add full contents of sachet to your washing machine detergent dispenser drawer. Run your hottest longest cycle (85-95°C). Enjoy your sparkling clean washing machine! (Ensure your washing machine is empty before use)
description: Product Description Previous page Next page 1 6-in-1 Action 2 Dissolves Hair 3 Kills 99.9% Bacteria 4 Kind on the Environment Step 1 Add contents of sachet into your washing machine detergent dispenser drawer. Step 2 Run your longest, hottest cycle on empty at 85-95°C (run at 60°C if you don't need to dissolve hair). Step 3 Repeat every 1-2 months to prevent blockages and maintain freshness. Step 4 Enjoy your fresher laundry and clean machine.
